New Records: Germany got their UEFA Nations League campaign off to a winning start with a 5-0 thrashing of Hungary.
Germany put five past Hungary in a ruthless display.
Key Match Events: Jamal Musiala scored a solo wondergoal as Germany thumped Hungary 5-0.
Florian Wirtz and Aleksandar Pavlovic also found the back of the net for Germany.
Kai Havertz wrapped up the three points from the spot after being hauled down in the box.
Pre-Game Insights: There were no pre-game insights provided in the article.
Post-Match Reflections: Germany got their UEFA Nations League campaign off to a flyer!
Julien Nagelsmann will be delighted with Germany's clean sheet.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Merkur Spiel-Arena in Dusseldorf.
Germany made a double change at 69' and 70' with Robert Koch and Benjamin Henrichs coming on.
